definition[0]: to give someone some experience or knowledge of a particular problem or situation so that they can notice it and understand it easily
example[0]: Volunteers need to be sensitized to the cultural differences they will meet in African countries.
definition[1]: if someone is sensitized to a particular substance, their body has begun to have a bad reaction whenever they touch it, breathe it etc
example[1]: Many hospital workers have become sensitized to the latex in gloves.
explanation[0]: Sensitize is usually passive in this meaning
definition[2]: to treat a material or a piece of equipment so that it will react to physical or chemical changes
